header.note: The character "%" (out of a numerical context) is a meta-character that will be replaced (often by a numeric value) before the string is displayed
Text between less than (<) and greater than (>) symbols is a variable's name and must not be localised

trans-unit.source:
This database structure file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12.
You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.
trans-unit.target:
This database structure file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12.
You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.

trans-unit.source: This database structure file seems to be damaged. For more information look in the journal file. Do you really want to convert it ?
trans-unit.target: This database structure file seems to be damaged. For more information look in the journal file. Do you really want to convert it ?

trans-unit.source: The checking process has been canceled. Do you really want to convert the structure file ?
trans-unit.target: The checking process has been canceled. Do you really want to convert the structure file ?

trans-unit.source: This database structure file has not been converted for 4th Dimension version 6.
trans-unit.target: This database structure file has not been converted for 4th Dimension version 6.

trans-unit.source: Missing or damaged table name list (WN4D ^)
trans-unit.target: Missing or damaged table name list (WN4D ^)

trans-unit.resname: You are not allowed to convert this database.
trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to convert this database.
trans-unit.target: You are not allowed to convert this database.

trans-unit.source:
This data file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12.
You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.
trans-unit.target:
This data file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12.
You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.

trans-unit.source: This database used an old compatibility mode (BBOX resource) which is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: This database used an old compatibility mode (BBOX resource) which is no longer supported.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to stop the conversion process?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to stop the conversion process?

trans-unit.source: Your database cannot be upgraded to version 12 because it contains component(s). Please uninstall the component(s) from your database with 4D Insider before converting your structure.
trans-unit.target: Your database cannot be upgraded to version 12 because it contains component(s). Please uninstall the component(s) from your database with 4D Insider before converting your structure.

trans-unit.source: No segment has been detected automatically. Please select it/them manually on your disk(s).
trans-unit.target: No segment has been detected automatically. Please select it/them manually on your disk(s).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to replace the “Replaced Files” folder?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to replace the “Replaced Files” folder?

trans-unit.source: Impossible to empty the “Replaced Files” folder.
trans-unit.target: Impossible to empty the “Replaced Files” folder.

trans-unit.source: Please check your database with 4D Tools (use the version corresponding to the database) before conversion.
trans-unit.target: Please check your database with 4D Tools (use the version corresponding to the database) before conversion.

trans-unit.source: 4D Application cannot convert this database. For more information, click on the "Details" button.
trans-unit.target: 4D Application cannot convert this database. For more information, click on the "Details" button.

trans-unit.source: Insufficient disk space. Please free up space and try again to convert the database.
trans-unit.target: Insufficient disk space. Please free up space and try again to convert the database.

trans-unit.source: Do not execute code when opening database (On Startup... methods).
trans-unit.target: Do not execute code when opening database (On Startup... methods).

trans-unit.source: 4D replaces certain files in your database folder. The originals of the replaced files will be stored in the “Replaced Files” folder.
trans-unit.target: 4D replaces certain files in your database folder. The originals of the replaced files will be stored in the “Replaced Files” folder.

trans-unit.source: By precaution, it is nevertheless advisable to carry out a complete backup of your database folder before proceeding with the conversion.
trans-unit.target: By precaution, it is nevertheless advisable to carry out a complete backup of your database folder before proceeding with the conversion.

trans-unit.source: This structure file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12. You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.
trans-unit.target: This structure file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12. You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the original structure file will be made at the following location: “<STC_R_Folder_Path>”
trans-unit.target: A copy of the original structure file will be made at the following location: “<STC_R_Folder_Path>”

trans-unit.source: This structure file is already converted in version v12.
trans-unit.target: This structure file is already converted in version v12.

trans-unit.source: A structure definition XML file named “catalog.xml” will be generated at the following location: “<STC_R_Catalog_Path>”.
trans-unit.target: A structure definition XML file named “catalog.xml” will be generated at the following location: “<STC_R_Catalog_Path>”.

trans-unit.source: Keep it because it will be necessary if you want to convert again your 2004 structure preserving your v12 data file.
trans-unit.target: Keep it because it will be necessary if you want to convert again your 2004 structure preserving your v12 data file.

trans-unit.source: The “catalog.xml” file already exists at the following location: “<STC_R_Catalog_Path>”.
trans-unit.target: The “catalog.xml” file already exists at the following location: “<STC_R_Catalog_Path>”.

trans-unit.source: This data file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12. You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.
trans-unit.target: This data file is going to be converted to work with 4D Application v12. You will not be able to open it with previous versions of these products anymore.

trans-unit.source: This file is damaged or is not a 4D data file.
trans-unit.target: This file is damaged or is not a 4D data file.

trans-unit.source: The WEDD signature of the data file selected does not correspond to the structure file WEDD signature.
trans-unit.target: The WEDD signature of the data file selected does not correspond to the structure file WEDD signature.

trans-unit.source: All the segments below will be automatically converted into version 12 and will be joined together in a single data file.
trans-unit.target: All the segments below will be automatically converted into version 12 and will be joined together in a single data file.

trans-unit.source: 4D was not able to find a data file for this database. Please select another one by clicking on the “Other data file...” button.
trans-unit.target: 4D was not able to find a data file for this database. Please select another one by clicking on the “Other data file...” button.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the original data file will be made at the following location: “<DTC_BackUp_Path>”
trans-unit.target: A copy of the original data file will be made at the following location: “<DTC_BackUp_Path>”

trans-unit.source: The new data file will be created at the following location: “<DTC_R_New_Path>”
trans-unit.target: The new data file will be created at the following location: “<DTC_R_New_Path>”

trans-unit.source: The selected data file comes from a previous database conversion. To be able to use it with the new structure which will be generate during this conversion, you must place the file “catalog.xml” beside the structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: The selected data file comes from a previous database conversion. To be able to use it with the new structure which will be generate during this conversion, you must place the file “catalog.xml” beside the structure to convert.

trans-unit.source: This data file is already converted in version v12.
trans-unit.target: This data file is already converted in version v12.

trans-unit.source: The selected data file comes from a previous database conversion and is not in conformity with the file catalog.xml placed beside the structure to convert. It can not be used.
trans-unit.target: The selected data file comes from a previous database conversion and is not in conformity with the file catalog.xml placed beside the structure to convert. It can not be used.

trans-unit.source: This database structure file has been made with a newer version of 4D. It cannot be used with this version.
trans-unit.target: This database structure file has been made with a newer version of 4D. It cannot be used with this version.

trans-unit.source: This data file has been made with a newer version of 4D. It cannot be used with this version.
trans-unit.target: This data file has been made with a newer version of 4D. It cannot be used with this version.

trans-unit.source: This data file has been created or converted by a newer version of 4D. It is not recommended to open it with this version of 4D if it uses specific functionalities of the newer version. Do you still want to open it?
trans-unit.target: This data file has been created or converted by a newer version of 4D. It is not recommended to open it with this version of 4D if it uses specific functionalities of the newer version. Do you still want to open it?
